title: All NBA Finals Takes Are Possible
description: Hot Takedown looks back at Game 3 of the NBA Finals and the MLB All-Star break. Plus: A rant about English soccer, as a treat.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Hot Takedown looks back at Game 3 of the NBA Finals and the MLB All-Star break.
